articles.description: The long-awaited Take a Break feature on Instagram is testing with a small number of users on the platform, as the company grapples with reports that users, particularly teenagers, feel “addicted” to the app.
articles.content:
The long-awaited feature could be rolled out to all users in December
Instagram is testing a Take a Break feature to get you off the app
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Head of Instagram A… [+2920 chars]
